类 Entrance

java.lang.Object
  Entrance

public class Entrance
extends java.lang.Object

Display menu on screen and get the response from user.

版本：
(2.8)
作者：
(Miao Wang)

Ask for the car age from user and receive the result.

返回：
the age

返回：

askCarModel

public java.lang.String askCarModel()
Ask for the car model from user and receive the result.

返回：
the model

askColour

public java.lang.String askColour(java.lang.String number)
Ask for the colour from user and receive the result.

参数：
number - the serial number of colours
返回：
the colour

askEditOption

public java.lang.String askEditOption()
Ask for the edit option number from user and receive the result.

返回：
a String represents the edit option number

返回：
